Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    The team class represents the team of agents belonging to the same player. The team membership is decided in the GameEnvironment class when agents join the game based on their name's first 6 characters.
    Author:
    Peter Eredics

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Members of the team

      The model of the game world
